mapper.insert: insert into tb_u3d_web_exp_result(experiment_id, experiment_method_id, user_id, total_pick_time, effective_time, create_time, update_time, efficiency, walk_step, experiment_times, worker) values (#{experimentId},#{experimentMethodId},#{userId},#{totalPickTime},#{effectiveTime},now(),now(),#{efficiency},#{walkStep}, #{experimentTimes},#{worker})
